We are implementing strict regulations on wearing life vest during the entire stay in our spots.

 Rules and Regulations 
 New Policy Implemented with in the Spot. 
 1. No Tourguide No Entry 
 2. No Life Vest No Entry 
 3. No ambulant vendors allowed 
 4. We strictly implementing CLAYGO (clean as you go) 
 5. We allowed bringing of pets

RULES AND REGULATION 
 Things to remember:
 We are open everyday from 5am - 5pm. 

 Everyone is welcome ~ kids, senior citizens and furbabies. 

 Tour guide is required by the tourism office and for your safety 

 We have a wide and secure parking space 

 No need for reservation. We accept walk-ins.
Monday - Friday: 8AM - 5PM \n Saturday - Sunday and Holidays: 7AM - 5PM

Rules and Regulation

 1. No Tourguide No Entry
 2. No Life Vest No Entry 
 3. No ambulant vendors allowed 
 4. We strictly implementing CLAYGO (clean as you go) 
 5. We only allowed limited numbers of liquors in a group
